Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: The only thing was the massive American tour group that took over the place but that wasn t the hotels fault
Positive_Review: Fantastic breakfast After traveling around Europe for over a month we found this to be the most amazing breakfast that was included They even took special orders for specialty coffee etc A real plus Also the beds and down comforters were phenomenal and overall thenplace was really quiet for being in a big city We got some much needed shuteye

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: I could not use wifi diring my breakfast it is not stable Television off from international channels at 9 30 on the day of my departure
Positive_Review: To have bottle of water in my room and a kettle It is really lovely I made two reservations and was glad that the problem resolved quickly and without my intervention Good job

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: I could not use wifi during breakfast Wifi not stable On the day of departure the French television programs were turned off at 9 30 It s too early and not practical for tourists
Positive_Review: Guaranteed a good level of comfort no unpleasant surprises I was delighted to find a bottle of water and a kettle in my room on arrival day I made two reservations and was glad that my problem was solved without my intervention Good Job

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: There was rubbish in the bathtub when we checked in The kitchen closed at 11pm so even though we had just gotten off the plane and were hungry we couldn t eat The hotel is not located in the centre of town either so it would ve been difficult to find any food near the hotel
Positive_Review: Reasonably priced Easy to park Wifi connection was steady and decently fast

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Parking is a bit high at 25 Euro per day
Positive_Review: Excellent beds Very nice nice breakfast Space is a bit crowded but they have an excellent choice of breakfast items Staff is extremely cordial

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: The location A litle far from all the main atractions in Viena Only Belvedere museum was near however there s always taxis at the door
Positive_Review: Bedroom clean and big Staff very helpfull specially Paul and Sofia at the front desk that were very kind the breakfast was so good that I would call it brunch

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: The breakfast area was very hectic and crowded Staff did not manage to remove used plates deliver drinks and set the tables at the same time I would recommend to put also some Austrian wine in the minibar not just beer
Positive_Review: Comfortable accommodation opposite Akademietheater and Konzertverein lovely for music addicts during the concert season Next metro station Stadtpark is about 500 m to walk Room was big enough well equipped with tea kettle and Wifi beds were comfortable and the air condition worked very well Fresh mineral water for free every day Bathroom was also well equipped even though taking a shower caused some flooding on the floor

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: All the female staff at the reception desk and in the breaksfast room were extremely helpful and friendly However two of the male staff one at reception and one in the breakfast room were not friendly and spoke abruptly to us They need to be told to be more service minded polite and friendly
Positive_Review: Excellent breakfast and very comfortable and light room with excellent facilities and Wifi Generally very friendly and helpful hotel staff see comment in next box

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The location is really good just in the city center The room is a bit small and facilities are a bit old but but enough for single person Staffs are very helpful and friendly

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Breakfast wasn t great
Positive_Review: Location is great close to subway stations and bus stops Many attentions are within walking distance Bed is really comfy

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Breakfast see above
Positive_Review: The hotel and the staff were very pleasant friendly and helpful We had dinner and breakfast at Oskars the restaurant but wouldn t recommend this The dinner was mediocre and the breakfast poor Plenty of it but all the hot food came out of Bain Marie s and was mediocre at best The hotel is a 3 minute walk to the Koncerthaus which is very convenient if you have booked a show there

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The staff was fantastic and really went above and beyond to help out They also had computers and printers to help with check ins The location was perfect and in walking distance to all attractions in Vienna as well as the metro and train stations

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: The restaurant area was a bit cramped and you felt that you were on top of each other it needed to be a bit more spacious
Positive_Review: The food at breakfast and dinner in the evenings was superb although a bit pricey but we couldn t fault it at all My husband enjoyed the steak and I chose the Wiener Schnitzel which were both excellent

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Very small shower for wide people One of the waitresses made a remark to people who do not speak English very well It was not very professional
Positive_Review: The hotel is located not far from the historical center You can walk on foot both to the shops and to the park Lovely breakfast with fresh fruit croissants cappuccino There is also a continental breakfast Comfortable bed You can have tea and coffee in the room

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: The cups in the room were both dirty and full of old sugar The coffee milk was out of date and ruined the coffee tea There was black hair on the floor of my room in the bathroom and even on the sheets every day A piece of rubber band in the soup of the restaurant Room was over heated and air condition did not work Floors are worn out and bathroom in need of refurbishing Paint coming off the walls
Positive_Review: the variety of breakfast apfel strudel palat schinken kaiser schmarrn good tea selection and different juices Also english breakfast available The location of the hotel is handy and close to all important places walking distance

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Maybe more than the one English breakfast tea bag on offer would have been appreciated
Positive_Review: Very warm welcome from reception staff and extremely helpful staff in dining room for breakfast which offered a wide range to tempt the appetite The hotel proved to be well placed and we enjoyed the 10 to 15 minute walk into the city centre Our room was quiet and comfortable We could not have asked for more

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Booked Superior Room the best room the property has It was most terrible to be woken up by the sound of the hotel s elevator electrical engine every morning The noise is so intense that you can forget about sleeping between 6am and 8am The most disappointing fact is that hotel staff knows about the problem since they readily provide ear plugs but only after complaints and still continue to offer the room as the best accommodation in the property
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Bathroom was a little noisy so kept door shut not sure if it was drainage or extractor fan
Positive_Review: Great service Free late check out for marathon runners

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Restaurant has basic dinner with little choice Breakfast very good Service in evening restaurant leaves a lot to be desired slow forgetful inattentive
Positive_Review: Excellent value for money nothing to improve except restaurant

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The hotel is exactly as described perfectly located downtown but out of the heavy traffic easy to access by car The parking is in the building directly accessible by elevator elegant

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Breakfast should be included for the price of the room
Positive_Review: Excellent location next door to the Weiner Konzerthaus and within easy walking distance to major shopping streets and sights Fantastic will stay again

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Check in and out a bit slow only two desks we had to wait both times the room was a bit too warm
Positive_Review: Excellent location we went to a concert at the Konzerthaus right next door Accessible by a short walk throughnthe park from Wien Mitte train station where the airport express arrives rooms had everything we needed Staff was very friendly we got the room early in the morning

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Nothing at all
Positive_Review: Very comfortable bed spacious room staff very friendly and helpful especially Paul Kreiner at reception Located very close to centre for all attractions 10 minute walk Best hotel in a long time

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Pleasant hotel in the centre of Vienna All major sights are accessible by foot The staff was excellent Decent breakfast good WiFi I would be happy to return

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Floor in the room supposed to be cleaned much better And I found that plates used for corn flakes in hotel s restaurant weren t really easy to use
Positive_Review: Wonderful location Very convenient to get to the must seen places in Vienna It s just walking distance to airport city train station I like a style of the hotel and hospitality of hotel s staff

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Heating is set to high even if turned off in the rooms Breakfast is quite expensive
Positive_Review: Clean and comfortable Service is nice and helpful Very good for the price

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Everything from the moment we arrived The staff were polite and friendly Room was good size and the bed was huge Breakfast was amazing one of the best we have experienced Location is so handy for a short walk into the centre

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Location central but on a busy street Room quiet but no view
Positive_Review: The queensize bed was really extra comfy Breakfast was generous and fresh Staff at front desk very helpful with every wish or question I had

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: The room had twin beds and lights in wrong place and strange layout as a bit cramped Think it was for a double bed or a single The TV signal kept going and difficult to navigate to channels Otherwise ok
Positive_Review: The location was great The dinner was very nice The room was quiet A little small for twin as layout a bit strange but for price it was very good Just think room more suited to single Very near train station and easy to find

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: I had dinner on Friday evening and the waiter was at best indifferent That was the only time service was poor The breakfast staff were terrific every day as was the breakfast
Positive_Review: The hotel is located near everything I wanted to see within walking distance It is lovely The staff were helpful and gracious

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Too slow service at breakfast in room menu not good quality for high price several hours to take back plates even after call
Positive_Review: Really good tea nice bed for child convenient location nice room

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: A waiting line to be seated for breakfast is unacceptable for the price we payed Especially because there were free tables so no need to hold people waiting An overall delay of almost 30 min is no good start of the day The room wasn t particularly clean either especially during the stay Overall I would expect better service for the money
Positive_Review: Stylish interior a comfortable room atmospheric Some nice little extra s such as little chocolates or a cup of herbal tea in the evening

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Our room window faced the street and it was a bit loud in the mornings
Positive_Review: Amazing breakfast The staff were extremely helpful with all of our questions We loved the location within walking distance of many of the Christmas markets

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: It was mostly good though the lifts were a bit difficult to operate and the decor was a little tired but for what we paid you can t really complain
Positive_Review: Great breakfast and lovely staff

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: a lot of dust in the room
Positive_Review: location only about 10 minutes of walk to opera round the corner from the Christmas markets staff very comfortable bed quite room

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Poor internet connection especially in the evening A very unpleasant surprise especially if your work depends on the connectivity No reasonable explanation by the stuff
Positive_Review: Location and everything else

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Free city tour was excellent Breakfast was very tasty with variety of food even with miso soup that I love so much and smoked salmon not together lol Staff friendly and caring Brilliant advice on city attractions ways to travel and local eateries Thank you

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: More TV channels that were not just news channels Sofa in the room could be reupholstered
Positive_Review: Cosy hotel location was great You just have to take the City Airport Train to Mitte then it s a 10 minute walk to the hotel Very good location Buffet was really good tasty food staff were very nice Beds were comfy Chocs on your pillow every night with the weather forecast card How thoughtful

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: What I liked most is the staff
Positive_Review: First the staff are highly professional and extremely friendly It is located in a quiet area yet within walking distance to downtown metro station and CAT The hotel has a great balance of modern and good function

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: very unreliable and slow internet connection practically unusable for work heating not working even when freezing outside so temperature in the room was far from comfortable
Positive_Review: perfect location own easily accessible garage very good breakfast

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: The breakfast service could have been better wasn t greeted at breakfast Struggled to find someone to get me a breakfast tea Could have done with a few more breakfast staff Other than that the breakfast food was good
Positive_Review: Great service quick check in and check out

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Nothing to suggest by way of improvements
Positive_Review: Convenience to Concert Halls and helpful directions for travel to locations in the city Well equipped room

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Nothing the hotel included everything we wished for
Positive_Review: Staff is extremely friendly room is spacious clean and very comfortable especially the bed Above all location and breakfast are excellent Exactly what you need when you visit Vienna

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: The staff is outstanding but the owner or manager does not take action hat is obviously required We had one of the better rooms There was a single bed to be used as a couch with added cushions for a back rest This lack of a comfortable place to sit is not what one pays for Here it was made much worse by fact that the curtains behind the bed go to the floor and cannot be drawn unless the couch bed is away from the wall which means that when one leans back the cushions fall back Thus one must sit as on the edge of a bed This has been a problem since the room was furnished perhaps a decade ago The staff tried but there is just not a solution short of a real couch If management is not willing to do this perhaps the curtains could be hemmed so that the bed does not block pulling them closed at night
Positive_Review: The location is about perfect

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: horrid meat choices cheap juice cereal pre served in mugs with no room for milk decor not very sofitel definitely seemed like a cheaper model
Positive_Review: nice staff

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: N A
Positive_Review: Location is perfect at the heart of the city Rooms are clean and large enough Wi fi was satisfactory And the staff was helpfull It s a perfect choice for visiting Vienna For the next visit it will be my first choice

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: The personal from cleaning not performed cleaning of room does t change the things from bathroom
Positive_Review: The personal very professional and dedicated from restaurant on breakfast

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: The food in the restaurant attached to the hotel was very poor in the evening
Positive_Review: Everything fantastic and the breakfast was fab I can t see why anyone would have anything bad to say

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: We loved this hotel we picked it because of such high guest rating and it def lived up to that 10m of thst wall ro center close to everything We had a comfy crib in our room for baby Sheets were clean beds were comfy

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: It was the 3rd time to stay at this hotel and we think it is the best choice to stay in Vienna Hotel is comfortable staff is nice breakfast is very good wifi is excellent The tram stop is in 2 minutes walk metro station is in 7 min walk Stephans Dom is in 15 minutes walk

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Breakfast zone is pretty small for such hotel Be ready to wait up to 10 minutes in lobby until they invite you
Positive_Review: A spacious room with a large window The most delicious breakfast we ve ever eaten at the hotel a great choice of cheeses and appetizers Easy to get there from Hauptbahnhof just 25 minutes walking through beatiful Belvedere park And most importantly on Saturdays at 10 00 am they offer free 2 hour tours through the quiet courtyards of the old town English and German languages It was very interesting

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Bathroom was ok but sorry very inconvenient toilet tub Would be good to have more modern type of sanitary equipment in the stylish hotel
Positive_Review: Location is excellent quite street but close to center and Belvedere tram stop is in 3 min walking Hotel is renovated with good taste Klimpt style room was spacy good cleaning very good breakfast Wi Fi was at acceptable good level Tea set in the room Staff at the reception is very friendly We did laundry and it was done in a perfect way

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: All of it
Positive_Review: Rooms with very tired and old furniture uncomfortable beds with ridiculous light fittings that get in the way of the pillows Bathrooms tiny AC ineffective Flat screen TV is a complete fabrication The TV content is poor and reception irregular Room service menu is lacking with variety Utter chaos at breakfast times Not enough space to walk safely Staff in panic Slow response to replenish food Worst Accor Brand ever experienced

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Wi Fi is very slow and needs to be upgraded
Positive_Review: The location is really perfect The center of Vienna is just 10 15 meters of walk distance The staff is very friendly and helpful The rooms are clean and the breakfast is also very good

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The rooms are large with very comfortable beds The breakfast was fabulous serving big variety of Viennese coffe drinks The hotel location is perfect for exploring the city you are very close to many landmarks and convenient transport connections to all directions

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: The room was on the top and I add always a kind of background noise most probably from some AC engine for me it was ok since I was extremely tired and I could sleep anyway but some people may not like it The facilities are very very old and need a urgent refurbishment The TV was a smart TV from the early 00 s with a very very bad signal reception ok I was not there to watch tv but at least I would like to actually be able to watch a TV channel if I need want to If the mattress could speak she would probably tell you some good stories as it was old and used for good All these aspects are ok if you don t care too much or if we are dealing with a cheap hotel But I wasn t expecting this from a supposedly good brand I stayed in IBIS and Holiday Inn much better than this for half of the price
Positive_Review: The location Cleanliness and the fact that the Hotel provided instant coffee and tee you could use for your breakfast Bathroom goodies were also very good

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Breakfast time is very crowded Most days we had to wait to be seated which is not a problem in itself you just need to be aware and plan accordingly if time is an issue for you But breakfast is included and worst the wait
Positive_Review: The location is great You can easily just walk to all the main attractions But even though the hotel is very close to the city centre it s located at a fairly quiet street I was placed in a very quiet room perfect for a good night sleep after all the sightseeing

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: I highly recommend this hotel Everything was very well done great location near Karlsplatz the Ringstrasse and the U bahn and a very helpful and friendly staff We will be back next time we visit Vienna again

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Wifi was weak but really we did not travel to Vienna to surf the internet There was a strange situation with minibar in the end but it was resolved by the staff without any problems
Positive_Review: As for us it was 10 out of 10 Perfect staff very responsive to our requests Very nice room clean and comfortable We stayed when the temperature was over 30 and enjoyed complimentary mineral water each day served to our room Breakfasts were tasty Location was perfect to visit theatres and other places we planned to visit Small fun tip if you are in your room and look under the bed on the last day to check if you left nothing you will have a lot of fun as we did Hope to visit other chain properties

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: The few restaurant staff had disappointed me during my stay 22 06 2016 to 25 06 2016 During my first breakfast I found a cling film in my salmon parcel and mentioned it to the one of the staff I was not expecting much but a reassurance that the rest of the food had been prepared to the highest standard of safety and hygiene was expected In fact the same staff to whom I brought this attention to didn t even say a word let alone any apology On my last day of breakfast while I was still having my breakfast the staff just took away my cup without asking whether I had finished my breakfast Not until I made a remark to my friend of what had happened then only the same staff brought over a cup Also on that same morning over breakfast I was sitting on the table for two by the cutlery station On safety ground the staff could have stood further away from the myself the sitting guest rather than having tray of pots of coffee teas and dirty plates and cutlery over my shoulder and head I dread to think if any of them dropped those trays over me I could have suffered serious injury
Positive_Review: The bed in 625 was comfortable and love the arty Gustav K headboard The front house staff particularly Oliver were friendly and very accommodating

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: The air was not very fresh in the room and hallway and the room was a bit old
Positive_Review: The breakfast was very good The location was pretty good The bed and pillows were comfy The staff was very friendly

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: hotel decor and the room decor are a little outdated for a standard of 4 star hotel although it was deluxe double the room is small and the TV is an old one room rate is almost the same as other well known good 5 star hotels
Positive_Review: location as it is in a walking distance towards the city center and other attractions

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Nothing bad to say
Positive_Review: Everyone was so gracious and helpfulness Anna and Marie at the reception desk were extremely helpful with directions and answering our questions And Sharika in the cafe was so friendly and made us feel at home

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Positive_Review: The friendliness and helpfulness of the staff The location of the Hotel opposite the Music Academie Breakfast perfect The only thing that I would appreciate is a mirror with a fuse in the room for blow drying my hair

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Restaurant left a lot to be desired Bathroom facilities were sub par The AC wasn t very good did not cool as low as it said it would
Positive_Review: Location was good Staff was nice Wifi was great

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Too far from touristy areas nothing within walking distance needing tram or metro transportation Located by a seedy train station
Positive_Review: Most of the staff was helpfull The breakfast selection and quality was good

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Breakfast not included in the price of the room
Positive_Review: Good location not far from the center Big double room with separate beds Water heater tee and cafe available

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Aircon not very efficient carpet stained with blood or red wine just one but large stain in a visible spot only one pillow per person but got secondary one on request
Positive_Review: Very nice service good location great buffet breakfast downstairs clean room and bathroom

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: TV was not working properly even I did not have breakfast I heard complains that is very hard to find a table as is overcrowded the elevators are very old need a modernization
Positive_Review: The location the room size amenities in the room personnel at the front desk

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Wall was a bit thin so could occasionally hear the next room Got room service food one night and it wasn t great
Positive_Review: Staff were very friendly and helpful Room was clean and a pleasant place to be Bed was comfortable Location was also great

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: nothing
Positive_Review: The breakfast was first class with a great choice of food Loved the d cor The staff were so helpful the location of the hotel couldn t be better positioned for sightseeing

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: The room service was OK But the pike perch served with corn was not tasty at all no salt no taste cold served Actually a no go The olives in the bar were cheap olives out of a tin Not appropriate from my point of view
Positive_Review: Excellent staff Very nice and friendly The hotel in the middle if the town and important museums and shopping area in walking distance

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Very crowdy at breakfast but it was eastern and a lot of people We had to change the room because of a waterproblem from the bathtub shower It was flowing all ower the floor room 629
Positive_Review: Nice decoration and comfortable beds Very good omelette and cafe latte in the morning Walking distance to the Stepahns Dom Taxi at the corner and underground few minutes away

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: They ran out of soya milk at 0730 one morning not acceptable dry muesli isn t nice
Positive_Review: The bed was soo comfortable great location quiet but still central enough to reach all the sights good variety at breakfast very friendly and helpful reception staff

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Breakfast the staff were very slow in providing coffee tea and on one morning forgot even after being reminded Otherwise the quality of breakfast was good but it is better if you have coffee
Positive_Review: the comfort of the room the overall ambiance of the hotel the friendliness of the reception

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: During the night it got so cold and windy in the room like as if there was no window at all
Positive_Review: Stuff is friendly breakfast are very tasty and rich the rooms are quite large and comfortable Very nice location

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: I didn t like the fact that the hotel did not offer any spa services
Positive_Review: The location was absolutely perfect we were near to the innere stadt in only 10 minutes walk

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Last year They had a smoking room bar Who disapeared and discriminate smoking people
Positive_Review: Large room clean greate Breakefast friendly staff excelent location near center Design hotel s very Beautifull with good taste

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: the out of proportionally small dining room making it difficult to have a quick and simple breakfast at a normal time for Vienna obliging one to lose time or being forced to go out
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Location for Christmas markets was ideal Staff were friendly helpful and efficient and dealt with a problem we encountered very satisfactorily and speedily I loved the decor and I will be recommending this hotel

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Could have body lotion in the room because very dry with heating during winter Bed was a bit soft
Positive_Review: Great location nice room decoration and very friendly staff Extensive breakfast buffet and bath tub in the room

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: The bar was a bit small and it would have been nice to have classic music playing instead of boom boom music Only real moan was having to queue for breakfast however once in the breakfast hall the choose of food was well worth it
Positive_Review: The location was walking distance to the main center little further to markets The bed was amazing so big and comfortable The pillows were puffed up they were like a airbags and sheets were crisp and made a very nice sleep Bath room had normal soaps towels etc during the day the staff often placed complementary chocolates into the room and refreshed the bed the staff were very helpful and highlighted items on a map will use the hotel again

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: I cannot rate the helpfulness of the staff highly enough Every person we came in to contact with was helpful considerate and went above and beyond their duties The hotel itself was beautifully appointed both in furnishing and location Do not miss Oskars restaurant

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Excellent location from which major tourist sites are easily accessible Also close to various means of transport metro tram etc Friendly staff and excellent breakfast

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Everything about the hotel is great wonderful Art Nouveau styling friendly helpful staff comfortable well decorated rooms and its location near the Wien Konzerthaus we were there with a group of friends to see Alfie Boe singing Pete Townshend s Classic Quadrophenia

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: One of the ceiling lamps didn t work One of the bins contained waste from the previous occupier when I arrived and there was a cleaning cloth left in the bath tub Kettle was awful and I almost burnt myself when I touched its handle as it wouldn t switch off automatically
Positive_Review: Central location warm inside quiet

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Bar very small and very warm The curtain in my room was coming off the track and really needed to be taken down to repair properly
Positive_Review: Nice for a single room Good location

Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: There always be some buses parking in front of the gate and close to the lounge by the street which sometimes make notice and pollution to gussets who are drinking
Positive_Review: Very nice location which nearby the bus route 71 Friendly staffs and lovely reception
